articles.title: The A.V. Club's most anticipated games of 2026 - AV Club
articles.description: We give a tentative thumb's up to 10 games that are currently supposed to come out in 2026--although release dates for games can't be trusted.
articles.content: Dont trust video game release dates. Delays and schedule changes run rampant, making it hard to ever take any announced date seriously. Well believe a games being released when were actually playing … [+11041 chars]
